SQL> select employee_name , salary,commission_pct ,salary + commission_pct as "monthly Income" from employees;

ORA-00904: "EMPLOYEE_NAME": invalid identifier

SQL> select first_name ,salary ,job_id, case job when 'SH_CLERK' then 1.20 * salary when 'MK_MAN' then 1.30 *salary when 'HR_REP' then 1.30 *salary else salary end "revised salary" from employees;
select first_name ,salary ,job_id, case job when 'SH_CLERK' then 1.20 * salary when 'MK_MAN' then 1.30 *salary when 'HR_REP' then 1.30 *salary else salary end "revised salary" from employees
                                        *
ERROR at line 1:
ORA-00904: "JOB": invalid identifier

SQL> create table emp1(empno number,ename varchar(15),sal number);

Table created.

SQL> alter table emp1 add( hiredate date,comm number);

Table altered.

SQL> alter table emp1 rename(comm , commission);

                       *

ORA-14155: missing PARTITION or SUBPARTITION keyword 


SQL> alter table emp1 rename comm to commission;

                        *

ORA-14155: missing PARTITION or SUBPARTITION keyword 


SQL> alter table emp1 rename column comm to commission;

ORA-00955: name is already used by an existing object

 Name                                                                                                              Null?    Type
 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 EMPNO                                                                                                                      NUMBER
 ENAME                                                                                                                      VARCHAR2(15)
 SAL                                                                                                                        NUMBER

SQL> select * from emp15;

no rows selected

SQL> create table emp200(empno number, ename varchar(15) default 'unknown', sal number default 0,hiredate date default sysdate);

Table created.

SQL> desc emp200
 Name                                                                                                              Null?    Type
 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 EMPNO                                                                                                                      NUMBER
 ENAME                                                                                                                      VARCHAR2(15)
 SAL                                                                                                                        NUMBER
 HIREDATE                                                                                                                   DATE

SQL> insert into emp200(ename ,sal,hiredate) values(1,'clara',3000,'19-aug-19');
insert into emp200(ename ,sal,hiredate) values(1,'clara',3000,'19-aug-19')
            *
ERROR at line 1:
ORA-00913: too many values 


SQL> insert into emp200(empno,ename ,sal,hiredate) values(1,'clara',3000,'19-aug-19');

1 row created.

SQL> insert into emp200(empno,ename) values(2,'clary');

1 row created.

SQL> select * from emp200;

     EMPNO ENAME                  SAL HIREDATE                                                                                                                                                          
---------- --------------- ---------- ---------                                                                                                                                                         
         1 clara                 3000 19-AUG-19                                                                                                                                                         
         2 clary                    0 28-AUG-19                                                                                                                                                         

SQL> insert into emp200(empno,sal) values(3,null);

1 row created.

SQL> select * from emp200;

     EMPNO ENAME                  SAL HIREDATE                                                                                                                                                          
---------- --------------- ---------- ---------                                                                                                                                                         
         1 clara                 3000 19-AUG-19                                                                                                                                                         
         2 clary                    0 28-AUG-19                                                                                                                                                         
         3 unknown                    28-AUG-19                                                                                                                                                         

SQL> insert into emp200(empno,sal) values(3,null);//explicit
  2  
SQL> insert into emp200(empno,sal) values(3,null);--explicit adding of null
  2  
SQL> alter table emp200 set unused(ename);

Table altered.

SQL> select * from emp200;

     EMPNO        SAL HIREDATE                                                                                                                                                                          
---------- ---------- ---------                                                                                                                                                                         
         1       3000 19-AUG-19                                                                                                                                                                         
         2          0 28-AUG-19                                                                                                                                                                         
         3            28-AUG-19                                                                                                                                                                         

SQL> desc emp200;
 Name                                                                                                              Null?    Type
 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 EMPNO                                                                                                                      NUMBER
 SAL                                                                                                                        NUMBER
 HIREDATE                                                                                                                   DATE

SQL> alter table emp200 drop unused columns;

Table altered.

SQL> select * from emp200;

TABLE_NAME                     TABLE_TYPE                                                                                                                                                               
------------------------------ -----------                                                                                                                                                              
COMMENTS                                                                                                                                                                                                
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_TSTZ_TAB_COLS             VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Columns of user's tables, which have column(s) defined on timestamp with time zone data type or ADT type containing attribute(s) of timestamp with time zone data type                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_TSTZ_TAB_COLS              VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Columns of user's tables, which have column(s) defined on timestamp with time zone data type or ADT type containing attribute(s) of timestamp with time zone data type                                  
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_TSTZ_TABLES               VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Description of the user's own tables, which have column(s) defined on timestamp with time zone data type or ADT type containing attribute(s) of timestamp with time zone data type                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_TSTZ_TABLES                VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Description of tables accessible to the user, which have column(s) defined on timestamp with time zone data type or ADT type containing attribute(s) of timestamp with time zone data type              
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
DBA_TSTZ_TABLES                VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Description of all tables in the database, which have column(s) defined on timestamp with time zone data type or ADT type containing attribute(s) of timestamp with time zone data type                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_ERRORS                    VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Current errors on stored objects owned by the user                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_ERRORS                     VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Current errors on stored objects that user is allowed to create                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_ERRORS_AE                 VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Current errors on stored objects owned by the user                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_ERRORS_AE                  VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Current errors on stored objects that user is allowed to create                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_SOURCE_AE                 VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Source of stored objects accessible to the user                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_SOURCE_AE                  VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Current source on stored objects that user is allowed to create                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_SOURCE                    VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Source of stored objects accessible to the user                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_SOURCE                     VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Current source on stored objects that user is allowed to create                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_TRIGGERS                  VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Triggers having FOLLOWS or PRECEDES ordering owned by the user                                                                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_TRIGGERS                   VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Triggers accessible to the current user                                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_INTERNAL_TRIGGERS         VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Description of the internal triggers on the user's own tables                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_INTERNAL_TRIGGERS          VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Description of the internal triggers on the tables accessible to the user                                                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_TRIGGER_COLS              VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Column usage in user's triggers                                                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_TRIGGER_COLS               VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Column usage in user's triggers or in triggers on user's tables                                                                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_DEPENDENCIES              VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Dependencies to and from a users objects                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_DEPENDENCIES               VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Dependencies to and from objects accessible to the user                                                                                                                                                 
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
PUBLIC_DEPENDENCY              VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Dependencies to and from objects, by object number                                                                                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_OBJECT_SIZE               VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Sizes, in bytes, of various pl/sql objects                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
ALL_TRIGGER_ORDERING           VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
Triggers having FOLLOWS or PRECEDES ordering accessible to the current user                                                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_TRIGGER_ORDERING          VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
USER_JOBS                      VIEW                                                                                                                                                                     
All jobs owned by this user

defined.

COUNTRIES                      TABLE                                                                                                                                                                    
country table. Contains 25 rows. References with locations table.                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
JOB_HISTORY                    TABLE                                                                                                                                                                    
Table that stores job history of the employees. If an employee                                                                                                                                          
changes departments within the job or changes jobs within the department,                                                                                                                               
new rows get inserted into this table with old job information of the                                                                                                                                   
employee. Contains a complex primary key: employee_id+start_date.                                                                                                                                       
Contains 25 rows. References with jobs, employees, and departments tables.                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
EMPLOYEES                      TABLE                                                                                                                                                                    
employees table. Contains 107 rows. References with departments,                                                                                                                                        
jobs, job_history tables. Contains a self reference.                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
JOBS                           TABLE                                                                                                                                                                    
jobs table with job titles and salary ranges. Contains 19 rows.                                                                                                                                         
References with employees and job_history table.                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
LOCATIONS                      TABLE                                                                                                                                                                    
Locations table that contains specific address of a specific office,                                                                                                                                    
warehouse, and/or production site of a company. Does not store addresses /                                                                                                                              
locations of customers. Contains 23 rows; references with the                                                                                                                                           
departments and countries tables.                                                                                                                                                                       
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
REGIONS                        TABLE                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                        
DEPARTMENTS                    TABLE                                                                                                                                                                    
Departments table that shows details of departments where employees                                                                                                                                     
work. Contains 27 rows; references with locations, employees, and job_history tables.

SQL> create table emp11(empno number,ename varchar(15),sal number,deptno number);

             *
ERROR at line 1:
ORA-00955: name is already used by an existing object 


SQL> create table emp12(empno number,ename varchar(15),sal number,deptno number);

Table created.

SQL> create table emp13(empno number,ename varchar(15),sal number,deptno number);

Table created.

SQL> insert into emp12 values(1,'tony',2000,10);

1 row created.

SQL> insert into emp12 values(2,'sony',3000,10);

1 row created.

SQL> commit;

Commit complete.

SQL> insert into emp13 values(2,'sony',3000,10);

1 row created.

SQL> delete from emp12 where empno=2;

SQL> merge into emp13 d using emp12 s on(s.deptno= d.deptno) when matched then update set d.empno= s.empno ,d.ename=s.ename, d.sal=s.sal when not matched then insert values(3,'romy',5000,40);

1 row merged.
